If all you need is the update, you can get it here directly from Microsoft, at much higher speeds (and it's 122 Mg, so also a much smaller file). I can confirm that installing the update over your existing version will not cause you to lose your registration.

it's working, 1. Install Office

                   3. After update Instal the update to 14.1.3  from folder
                   4. Done

1. Download this torrent's files
2. Install Office 2011
3. Download and install Service Pack 1 (14.1.0)
4. Install 14.1.3 update

Works perfectly on my MB Pro running OSX 10.6.8.  Thanks Anacondaz!

Hi there!
The upgrade installation doesn't find the installed office program. The original file from the ms-site doesn't work either. What could be wrong?

You need to download SP1 (14.1.0) from Microsoft (http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=17198), then install the 14.1.3 update.

Surprised XiSO missed this, they are usually spot on.

the pirate bay have switched to magnetic links as default, you need to set the default applications to your torrent client. i suggest some googling. if you knew to torrents perhaps you dont have a torrent client yet, in which case i recommend reading up about how torrents work. goodluck
